item.title: How Do I Make It Where It Say Owner [Name Has Log In]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“N0vlafe, post:12, topic:259815”]how come?[/quote]Because he doesn’t know.

Did you try searching for something like this:

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in”;

Or just search for “has logged in” and you should be able to add it wherever that is.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Make It Where It Say Owner [Name Has Log In]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Edp32281, post:4, topic:259815”]OK add this into ur client.java.

playerItems = loadgame.playerItem;
playerItemsN = loadgame.plaerItemN;
playerEquiment = loadgame.playerEquiment;
playerEquimentN = loadgame.playerEquimentN;
bankItems = loadgame.bankItem;
bankItemsN = loadgame.bankItemN;
playerLevel = loadgame.playerlevel;
playerXP = loadgame.playerXP;
//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": has logged in! There is now “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.”;
}

Try that and if it don’t work messege me.[/quote]That might be one way to do it. Most sources i’ve seen just use this though:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Allstar "))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Skillerzmine") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fatality") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Mike"))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-owner " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if (playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if (playerRights == 4)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if (playerRights == 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}
}

you’re going to change this part:

[QUOTE]
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOUR NAME HERE”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Make It Where It Say Owner [Name Has Log In]
item.dc:creator: @Edp32281 Edp32281
item.description:
@Edp32281 wrote:

OK add this into ur client.java.

playerItems = loadgame.playerItem;
playerItemsN = loadgame.plaerItemN;
playerEquiment = loadgame.playerEquiment;
playerEquimentN = loadgame.playerEquimentN;
bankItems = loadgame.bankItem;
bankItemsN = loadgame.bankItemN;
playerLevel = loadgame.playerlevel;
playerXP = loadgame.playerXP;
//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": has logged in! There is now “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.”;
}

Try that and if it don’t work messege me.

Read full topic
